titles.title: Dr. William W. Sullivan TRIO Upward Bound Student Stipend Support Act of 2023
Dr. William W. Sullivan TRIO Upward Bound Student Stipend Support Act of 2023
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to increase the maximum stipend amounts provided under Upward Bound projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Dr. William W. Sullivan TRIO Upward Bound Student Stipend Support Act of 2023
This bill increases the maximum stipend for students participating in the TRIO Upward Bound Program. Additionally, the bill requires the stipend to be increased based on the percentage increase in the Consumer Price Index.
